meta.job_title: Manager for Customer Success Renewal Quoting Team

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of quoting analysts to execute on key performance indicators for customer renewal activities.
Support and guide renewal quoting analyst team in quote creation, revision, and process improvement.
Establish relationships with team leads of adjacent functions to develop and streamline processes.
Drive effectiveness and efficiency in renewal quote creation/revision processes.
Ensure on-time, accurate, and actionable renewal quote creation and revisions.
Manage ambiguity and operate effectively in uncertain situations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Operations, Product, or Specialists role within a B2B organization
